oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ball Family coat of arms, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ball family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Postcard featuring two coats of arms for the Ball family. The front left section of the postcard features a Ball family coat of arms with a lion on top of a shield with three stars. The front right section of the postcard features a second coat of arms of the Ball family with a stag on top of a shield with three stars. The text below the image on the front left reads "Coat of Arms of William Ball, father of Mary Ball, the mother of George Washington." The text below the image the front right reads "Coat of arms of Alling Ball. Ancestor of the Georgia Balls."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Genealogy
William, Ball, 1615-1680
Ball family
